item.title: I-40 West - Exit 141
item.description: I-40 west at Exit 141 - W. Broadway/River Road. This is the eastern end of the Needles business loop.

item.title: I-40 West - Exit 143
item.description: I-40 west at Exit 143 - US-95 South/E. Broadway. US-95 north joins I-40 west through Needles. This is the eastern end of the Needles business loop.

item.title: I-40 West Approaching Exit 144
item.description: I-40 west approaching Exit 144 - US-95 South/East Broadway.

item.title: I-40 West - Needles Bus. Loop
item.description: Route 40 Business Loop next exit on I-40 west

item.description: I-40 west at Exit 141, W. Broadway/River Road
